response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $15,000 to us. However, to make this opportunity more accessible, I am offering it to you for a special introductory price of $14,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored for someone as discerning as yourself. Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this offer. I look forward to potentially working with you.", "product_price": 14000}
